price: 5. Kaasi waa Amarka Ilaahay uu idiin soo dejiyey, qofkiina dhowra (xilkuu saaray) Allaah wuxuu ka tiri xumaatooyinkiisa, oo siin ajar weyn.
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ أَمۡرُ ٱللَّهِ أَنزَلَهُۥٓ إِلَيۡكُمۡۚ وَمَن يَتَّقِ ٱللَّهَ يُكَفِّرۡ عَنۡهُ سَيِّـَٔاتِهِۦ وَيُعۡظِمۡ لَهُۥٓ أَجۡرًا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: dhālika amru al-lahi anzalahu ilaykum waman yattaqi al-laha yukaffir ʿanhu sayyiātihi wayuʿ'ẓim lahu ajran
